entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to a few flurries near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
